data.actual_result: Everything between the protocol and the @ is gone. In this example, `testbug@` will vanish, leaving only `http:// dabbit` in the message view
data.expected_result: It should show the link as you typed it
data.short_description: If you put an @ symbol inside a link, everything between the http:// and the @ disappears
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message containing a link with an @ symbol inside, e.g `http:// testbug @ dabbit`(make sure to remove spaces) - Observe the message in Android client
